name: Animated/Illustrated Under construction plug-in for WordPress
author: Moskva Yigit

sections.description:
Animated/Illustrated Under construction plug-in for WordPress

Features

  • Easy installation and manager
  • Responsive design support
  • Countdown

Click here to see the action on demo site!
sections.installation:
1. In your Dashboard click to add new plugin as normal WordPress plugin installation in your search type “utopia under construction” and find the plugin

    • you can download plugin from the plugin page
    • use your file manager or FTP to Upload the plugin to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.

  2. Activate it through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

  3. Enable plugin
  4. Please rate the plugin!
sections.faq:
Is there anyway to support the plug-in?

There’s a PayPal Donate button in the dashboard area or you can use https://www.buymeacoffee.com/moskvayigit for your donations!

Is there support ?

Further support is available at krasotaiskusstva.com/support/contact

Other works

You can find out my other works as well as if you need further customization/support, you can purchases services from my website at moskvayigit.com
